data.title: Homepage
data.meta_description: Leading the way to greener and smarter mobility worldwide, Alstom develops and markets integrated systems that provide the sustainable foundations for the future of transportation.
data.text:
Instagram alstom

Hanoi Metro Line 3 has started passenger service today, showcasing Alstom's first fully integrated metro system in Vietnam. We're proud to deliver a metro solution with cutting-edge expertise that enhances urban mobility and contributes towards sustainable transport, benefitting about 1.6 million Hanoi residents. The new line, operated by Hanoi Metro Company (HMC), will be officially inaugurated in September 2024 and is currently open for free public trial. We extend our heartfelt thanks to everyone involved for their invaluable contributions in particular our Client Hanoi Metropolitan Railway Management Board (MRB), the project Engineer, our Consortium partners & the Grantors. Join us in celebrating this achievement and our efforts to shape the future of mobility! #Metropolis #Vietnam #HanoiMetro

Instagram alstom

The first 2 Innovia Automated People Mover (APM) 300R cars are now in service in Singapore! Bukit Panjang LRT commuters can now enjoy a more comfortable ride with new features: ‚úÖAdvanced condition monitoring system to pre-empt faults ‚úÖIntelligent real-time condition monitoring. ‚úÖHigh Ventilation Air Conditioner (HVAC) with higher cooling and air flow capacity #MobilitybyNature #Singapore #BPLRT

Hello Rhineland! We're delighted to secure a landmark ‚Ç¨4 billion contract with @go.Rheinland and @vrs_verbindet to deliver 90 commuter trains for the S-Bahn Cologne network in Germany! üöÑ‚ú® Alongside the delivery of the trains, we will be ensuring their maintenance for 34 years. Our Alstom Adessia commuter trains will come in two versions: Short: 9 cars, nearly 150m, 1,150 passengers Long: 11 cars, almost 170m, 1,340 passengers Both reaching a maximum speed of 140 km/h. Designed for comfort and convenience, features include: Wi-Fi routers üì∂ & power sockets üîå Eco-friendly air conditioning üåû‚ùÑÔ∏è Enhanced mobile reception üì± Space for prams & bikes üö≤ Gap-bridging devices for level access Wheelchair areas & first S-Bahn toilets in Germany ‚ôøÔ∏èüöΩ Digital hearing system via Bluetooth üéß These trains are built to give you the best travel experience, blending innovation and sustainability. üíöüíô #Germany #SBahn #MobilityByNature

Instagram alstom

We delighted to announce that Alstom, in Alliance with DT Infrastructure has been awarded a contract from the Public Transport Authority of Western Australia to introduce advanced High Capacity Signalling technology for Perth‚Äôs suburban rail network in Australia. This will be the largest signalling project in the world by route length, delivered by an Alliance comprising the Public Transport Authority, Alstom and DT Infrastructure. DT Infrastructure‚Äôs expert local workforce will install Alstom‚Äôs world-class Urbalis Communications-Based Train Control signalling technology, that will deliver a 40% increase in capacity to the Perth network. The METRONET High Capacity Signalling project represents the culmination of nearly a decade of work by the Public Transport Authority, integrating the broader METRONET rail strategy encompassing the existing, extended and newly constructed C-series trains built by Alstom in Bellevue, Perth. Perth will enjoy the latest in signalling technology, network energy-saving benefits and state-of-the-art cybersecurity, guaranteeing local jobs and Perth‚Äôs transportation needs for the future. #TeamAlstom #MobilitybyNature üì∏ @railgallery

Celebrating a blend of fashion, empowerment, and sustainability! üåçüëó‚ú® The Alstom Foundation, in collaboration with Alstom Portugal, Funda√ß√£o Ajuda em A√ß√£o, and renowned designer @roselyn_silva, recently presented the "Women in Action" charity collection. This initiative, based in Loures near Lisbon, empowers women at risk of social exclusion by providing sewing and entrepreneurship training. 20 talented women trained under the guidance of expert staff, utilizing sewing machines and materials funded by the Alstom Foundation have co-created stunning patchwork fabrics with Roselyn Silva, now featured in her latest collection presented in Lisbon. #SocialImpact #CircularEconomy #WomenInAction

"I can‚Äôt even see its end!?‚Äù Our new trams for Berlin are real giants! At 50 meters long and 2.40 meters wide, this generation is the new king on Berlin's streets. More space for everyone (at least in the tram)! Running on one of the busiest tram lines in Germany, they provide even more comfort and safety with a new running gear, an updated lighting concept and improved accessibility - even with 100,000 passengers a day. Our long-standing cooperation with @BVG reaches the next milestone. In total, #TeamAlstom has already delivered 381 streetcars for Berlin - and there are many more to come! #MobilityByNature #LightRail
